00019 
00038 class IStepNode  : 
00039   public CComObjectRootEx<CComSingleThreadModel>,
00040   public CComCoClass<IStepNode, &CLSID_Node>,
00041   public IDispatchImpl<INode, &IID_INode, &LIBID_NiStepLib, /*wMajor =*/ 1, /*wMinor =*/ 0>,
00042   public ISymbolBase 
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   IStepNode()
00046   {   
00047     m_bAbstract=false;
00048     m_parent=NULL;
00049   }
00050   virtual ~IStepNode() {}
00051   bool IsPrimitive();
00052   bool & Abstract() { return m_bAbstract; }
00053   CString tagName () { return Name(); }
00054   CString dataType() { return Classname();  }  // 
00055   StepNodeType nodeType() { return Type(); }
00056 
00057   bool IsSimpleType() 
00058   {
00059     return (m_eType==integer_ || m_eType==real_ || m_eType == number_ || m_eType == boolean_ || m_eType == logical_ || m_eType==string_ || m_eType==enumeration_); 
00060   }
00061   bool IsListType() { return Type()== list_ || Type()== set_ || Type()== aggregate_ || Type()== array_ || Type()== bag_; }
00062 
00063   virtual Variables & GetVarDefs() { return m_vars; }
00064   virtual Variables & GetInstanceVars() { return m_instancevars; }
00065   virtual Variables * GetInstanceVarsPtr() { return &m_instancevars; }
00066   virtual Variables * GetVarDefsPtr() { return &m_vars; }
00067 
00068   virtual CString GetVarString(CString fmt=_T("")) {return _T("None"); }
00069   virtual HRESULT SetVarString(CString str) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
00070   virtual EXPVariant GetValue() { return (long) 0; }
00071 
00072   virtual CStringVector GetInheritanceChain() { return m_parents; }
00073   virtual CStringVector GetSupertypesChain()  { return m_supertypes; }
00074 
00075   CVarDefPtr GetVarDef(int n) 
00076   { 
00077     if(n>=GetVarDefs().size())
00078     {
00079       ::DebugBreak();
00080     }
00081     return GetVarDefs()[n]; 
00082   }
00083   CVarDefPtr GetInstanceVar(int n) 
00084   { 
00085     if(n>=GetInstanceVars().size())
00086     {
00087       // Fixme: could be storing string into EString... which doesn't have instance vars.
00088       ::DebugBreak();
00089     }
00090     return this->GetInstanceVars()[n]; 
00091   }
00092   //  virtual CString DumpVars() { return DumpCVarDefs(*GetVarDefs()); }
00093   CVarDefPtr FindVarDef(CString name) 
00094   {   
00095     return CVarDef::FindVarDef(this->GetVarDefs(), name); 
00096   }
00097 
00098   virtual bool hasChildNodes() { return m_vars.size() > 0; }
00099   IStepNodePtr firstChild() { if(m_vars.size() > 0) return m_vars[0]->GetStepNodePtr(); return NULL; }
00100   IStepNodePtr lastChild()  { if(m_vars.size() > 0) return m_vars[m_vars.size()-1]->GetStepNodePtr(); return NULL; }
00101   IStepList  childNodes() {IStepList nodes; for(int i=0; i< m_vars.size(); i++) nodes.push_back((IStepNode *) m_vars[i]->m_ref); return nodes; }
00102 
00103   bool IsKindOf(CString classname, IStepNodePtr node = NULL)
00104   {
00105     if(node==NULL)
00106       node=this;
00107     if(node->Classname() == classname)
00108       return true;
00109     CStringVector::iterator it = find(node->m_parents.begin(), node->m_parents.end(),classname);
00110     if(it!=node->m_parents.end())
00111       return true;
00112 
00113     return false;
00114   }
00115   static IStepNode * GetThisRef(CVarDefPtr  vardef, int index=-2);
00116 
00117   bool IsExistingAttribute(CString attrname);
00118   _variant_t GetAttributeValue(CString attrname,_variant_t vDefault);
00119   IStepNode * GetAttribute(CString attrname);

00121   CString GetAttributeExpClassname(CString attrname, CString strDefault);

00124   std::vector<double> ToVector(CString attrname);

00126   HRESULT AddAttribute(CString attrname){ if(QueryAttribute(attrname)==NULL) return E_FAIL; return S_OK; }

00128   IStepNodePtr QueryAttributeBranch(CString attrname, IStepElements & elements);

00140   int selectElementsByTagName(VarTable &table, CStringVector columns, CString fromnodes,  int bDistinct=false);

00145   HRESULT ReturnErrMessage(CString errmsg) {DebugBreak(); m_errmsg=errmsg; return E_FAIL; }
00146   CString GetErrMessage() { return m_errmsg; }

00212 
00213 // Object lifetime is managed locally. Not by COM
00214   STDMETHOD_(ULONG, AddRef)() { return 1; }
00215   STDMETHOD_(ULONG, Release)(){ return 1;   }
00216   STDMETHOD_(HRESULT, QueryInterface)( REFIID iid, LPVOID* ppInterface)
00217   {
00218     if ( ppInterface == NULL)
00219       return E_INVALIDARG;
00220     *ppInterface = NULL;  
00221     if ( iid == IID_IUnknown )
00222       *ppInterface = (IUnknown*) (IDispatch*)  (IStepNode*)  this;
00223     else if ( iid == IID_INode)
00224       *ppInterface =  this;
00225     else if ( iid == IID_IDispatch)
00226       *ppInterface = (IDispatch*) this;
00227     else return E_FAIL;
00228     return S_OK;
00229   }
00230
